title: Find maximum element in binary tree without recursion.
content:
We could have used either PreOrder, InOrder or PostOrder traversal to find the maximum in a Tree but as it is mentioned that we need to find the maximum without using Recursion.
Using Level Order Traversal we can find the Maximum element. We just need to observe the elements data while de

title: Search an element in binary tree without recursion.
content:
We can use level order traversal for solving this problem. The only change required in level order traversal is, instead of printing the date we just need to check whether the root data is equal to the element we want to search.

title: Top Places to Visit in Ballia, Uttar Pradesh
content: Ballia is a city with a municipal board in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh bordering Bihar. The eastern boundary of the city lies at the junction of two major rivers, the Ganges and the Ghaghara. The city is situated 140 km (87 mi) east of Varanasi. Bhojpuri is the primary local language. title: Top Places to Visit in Balrampur, Uttar Pradesh
content:
Balrampur is a city and a municipal board in Balrampur district in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India. It is situated on the bank of river Rapti and is the district headquarters of Balarampur district. Balrampur was a state in India. It is divided in 1748 and a part of U.P.

title: Top Places to Visit in Banda, Uttar Pradesh
content: Banda is a city and a municipal board in Banda district in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India. Banda lies south of the Yamuna river in the Bundelkhand region. title: Top Places to Visit in Barabanki, Uttar Pradesh
content:
Barabanki is a city in the state of Uttar Pradesh in India. It is the administrative headquarters of Barabanki District. The city is about 29 km east of Lucknow, the state capital.

title: Top Places to Visit in Bareilly, Uttar Pradesh
content: Bareilly (/bəˈrɛli/ (About this sound listen)) is a city in Bareilly district in the northern Indian state of Uttar Pradesh. content:

title: Top Places to Visit in Budaun, Uttar Pradesh
content: Budaun (also spelled as Badaun, formerly Vodamayuta) is a city and a seat of Budaun district, Uttar Pradesh, India. title: Top Places to Visit in Bulandshahr, Uttar Pradesh
content: Bulandshahr is a city and a municipal board in Bulandshahr district in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India. It is the administrative headquarters of Bulandshahr District. title: Sending email using Gmail SMTP in asp.net mvc application?
content:
You can use GMAIL SMTP service to send emails using c# .net MVC. You can specify the property constants in a config file for easy alteration.
Create Gmail Class comprises of all needed data type and member function as below.
